website_summaries.verdict: Like most retro Air Jordan basketball shoes (e.g. Air Jordan 6 and Air Jordan 11), the Fila 96 Low is a stylish and comfortable basketball shoe that will take you back to the good old ‘90s. At this point, it is hard to tell if these low-top basketball sneakers are any good on-court. However, players can pretty much expect more of the same as its mid-top counterpart since the only difference is the shoe’s cut. Overall, the low-top version of the Fila 96 is a must-try sneaker especially if you are a fan of Grant Hill.
pros: Most owners just love the Fila 96 Low
They claim that it is a great basketball sneaker
Many are commenting that these low-top basketball shoes are very comfortable to wear
According to one tester, the 2A cushioning of the 2013 version is very soft and provides a lot of impact protection
The full grain leather is of excellent quality, a reviewer describes
A lot of commenters love the Fila 96 Low’s style
cons: One tester gripes that only the side panels feature full grain leather
He claims that the forefoot is made of synthetic leather
There are hardly any reviews for the 2019 version of the Fila 96 Low

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes!!
customer_reviews.text: Use to have a pair of the originals white and blue and saw this color and wanted it first! Plan on getting the white and blue too!! Comfortable looks like the ones back in the day!
customer_reviews.author: Shon W

customer_reviews.title: these are awesome
customer_reviews.text: i use to have a pair of the originals so I wanted these when I saw them......I wear either a 11.5 or 12 and the 12 is a little too big but I can still wear them
customer_reviews.author: derrick bronson

customer_reviews.title: Runs big
customer_reviews.text: They were a little big but i couldn't return them because there wasn't an 11 1/2 available.
customer_reviews.author: Melvin L. Parker

customer_reviews.title: very nice throwback
customer_reviews.text: I love them but one shoe was a little dusty but i just cleaned it off because i been wanting them for a long time
customer_reviews.author: Hettie  Simmons

customer_reviews.title: I received old or worn sneakers
customer_reviews.text: They came in a crushed box with dirt spots and some white paint on the sneakers
customer_reviews.author: felicia

customer_reviews.title: Awesome throwbacks!
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. I wish more shoe companies would release more throwbacks, because (in my opinion) the shoes from the 90's were better made than what we get today.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Leflar

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes
customer_reviews.text: Very nice shoes. Fit was right for me. I am 8.5 normal size.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos

customer_reviews.title: They were a great price compared to everyone else.
customer_reviews.text: If u really want to wear Fila gear these are the shoes for it.
customer_reviews.author: GREGORY ALLAN HARVEY

customer_reviews.title: Fake FILA?
customer_reviews.text: Knock off, doubt if they were official FILA. Decided to use as my work shoes, did not look authentic
customer_reviews.author: fcastrojr3

customer_reviews.title: Simply Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: This is one beautiful shoe!!! I have to get a second pair so I have one to wear and one to put up.
customer_reviews.author: Derrick Ronewicz

customer_reviews.title: Wicked
customer_reviews.text: Super saucey shoe just didn’t like how they came late
customer_reviews.author: Roberto Rosales

customer_reviews.title: Grant Hill classic
customer_reviews.text: A classic that you should have if u in to sneakers I like every thing about this fit great
customer_reviews.author: Nikolai K S King

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: Love the old school flavor that it gives my son...
customer_reviews.author: Brian Walker

customer_reviews.title: Wish they still made these
customer_reviews.text: I don't know where the remaining stock of this shoe comes from, but the size choice is limited. I love this shoe and wish Fila still made these so that I could get a couple more in my size.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Walker

product_meta.title: Fila mens 96 Low
product_meta.description: These Mens Fila 96 Low Basketball Shoes are guaranteed authentic. They’re crafted with Leather/Textile, and the closure is .
feature_bullets: Signature 96 logo on upper, with additional FILA logo hits on the tongue and adjustable back strap
Rolled edge construction on toe and quarter
